# PBI #7: Update Code Creator Feature with Tag Suggestions

**Priority:** Medium  
**Story Points:** 5  
**Labels:** `enhancement`, `ui`, `feature`, `code-creator`

## Description
Integrate tag suggestions into the QR code creation feature.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] `CodeCreatorViewModel` updated to generate suggestions
- [ ] UI displays suggested tags after content entered
- [ ] User can apply suggested tags
- [ ] Suggestions update with debouncing
- [ ] Loading state shown
- [ ] Works with all QR code types
- [ ] Does not block QR code generation

## Dependencies
- Depends on PBI #4 and PBI #5

See TAG_SUGGESTIONS_IMPLEMENTATION_PLAN.md for full details.
